title: Interpretation of medicine in a dream and drinking medicine in a dream

preview.html: We see a dream about medicines, such as taking pills, buying medicine from a pharmacist, we see medicines, syrups, suction cups, treatments and ointments for a single woman, married woman, pregnant woman, and divorced woman. According to Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and others, medicine in a dream is one of the dreams that causes a state of anxiety and extreme confusion for the dreamer if he sees it in dreams, due to the fear of taking medicines or being exposed to disease, as medicine is one of the important matters in our general life that carries a lot. , many important indications that a person must know correctly, and medicine appears in many different forms, each of which carries a specific interpretation, we will explain to you as the commentator Ibn Sirin explains in his interpretations. Interpretation of medicine in a dream Seeing medicine in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will soon gain knowledge Useful. Also, drinking medicine in a dream indicates the integrity of the dreamer’s religion in many matters. Taking medicine in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is on the right path in various fields. Taking medicine with an unpleasant taste in a dream is evidence of the end of the disease in the near future. Taking yellow medicine in a dream also indicates that he will get sick in reality and suffer a lot from it. Seeing medicine with a bitter taste is evidence that the dreamer needs money in reality. Drinking medicine in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will get sick soon. Taking medicine Easily in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will soon recover from the disease. A patient taking medicine in a dream is evidence of his recovery from it, God willing. Seeing medicine in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of imminent marriage. Medicine in an unmarried woman’s dream also indicates good luck in life. Her next life. Bitter medicine in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she will face some problems and difficulties in her life. Easily drinking medicine in one dream is evidence that you will get rid of problems in the near future. Good medicine appears in a dream, evidence of the goodness coming to her. Seeing a sick girl taking medicine in a dream means that she will soon recover from the illness. Interpretation of drinking medicine in a dream: Whoever sees that he is drinking medicine for his illness, and agrees to it, this indicates the justice of his religion, and if he does not agree, the righteousness of his religion will be taken away from him, and whoever sees. He makes medicine for people, so this benefits them, and whoever sees that he took the medicine and his mind was withdrawn, he will be relieved of sadness. Drinking medicine in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar and Sheikh Muhammad Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing drinking medicine in a dream means money and wealth, especially if the dreamer is destitute and poor, This is if the medicine has a good taste and smell. Adversity and medicine in one dream. After mentioning the general interpretation mentioned by Ibn Sirin regarding seeing medicine in a dream, the dream of an unmarried girl or an unmarried doctor in her dream is a sign of marriage and good luck in it, if the medicine tastes good, but if it tastes bitter, then this indicates On a problem or the end of a relationship or a warning about a medicine in a married woman’s dream. As for the interpretation of a married woman’s vision

title: Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a sheep in a dream: A ram in a dream is generally good and is evidence of the fulfillment of the fortuneteller’s desires and the fulfillment of what is desired, and they are different. Seeing a sheep in a dream depends on the social status of the viewer. Sheep in a dream: A sheep in a dream indicates an approach of kindness to the owner of the vision and the pleasant changes that will happen to the pioneer, and the sheep can indicate To Hajj or to return to reality. Different. I mean seeing a sheep in a dream. A girl may marry a well-off man, but if the sheep is black, this will lead to problems that she will experience in her life. Sheep wool in the dreamer’s dream indicates weakness after an intimate relationship, because It indicates the stability of marital life and good feelings. As for the abundance of sheep in a married woman’s dream, this indicates the upcoming pregnancy or a sense of responsibility and thinking about life’s issues. Pregnancy in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a healthy child, and it also indicates that the fetus is a masculine body with good qualities. If a pregnant woman eats raw sheep meat, this means loss of the fetus or problems. Dead sheep in a dream. A dead sheep in a dream is a sign of disobedience to parents and abandonment of parents, and as is the case with many sheep, it indicates the approaching war in which the inhabitants of the dreamer’s town will be exposed and killed. Innocent people. A dead sheep in a dream can indicate a lack of confidence and tension that the dreamer is experiencing. As for what happened to the slaughter of a sheep in the dreamer’s dream, this indicates his closeness to God Almighty in the current period and may indicate freedom from desires or the end of pain and sorrows. As for Illegal slaughter of sheep means that the person with insight is exposed to major problems. But if a person slaughters himself, fear indicates the death of someone close to him. It also indicates the defeat of enemies and the achievement of goals. Seeing a sheep in a dream for a prisoner is evidence of the nearness of his freedom. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream is afraid of security. And the debtor spends. Interpretation of a sheep entering the house. Interpretation of a black sheep entering the house in a dream is an unpleasant vision, because it means problems between family members. Seeing a sheep in a dream for a man also indicates joy that the dreamer will approach and soon livelihood. Seeing a sheep in a dream for an unmarried woman, especially if If she was young, it means that she will marry a poorly behaved man. If the sheep is black, this is evidence that he will enter into a new love relationship that will not last long. The brown color of fear in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her soon-to-be happy husband, especially if he has been slaughtered in front of her. Seeing a sheep in an unmarried woman’s dream escaping to her home is a sign of kindness to the people of her home. Her care for the sheep is evidence of her husband’s well-being, and a blessing to her home. . As for raising a pregnant woman, it is a source of livelihood for her in the near future. If a woman sees that she is feeding a sheep, this is evidence of the dreamer’s good morals, but if a woman sees that she is slaughtering a sheep in her home, this is a sign of loss of interest. Giving a sheep to a woman by her husband indicates kindness and blessing. Which the dreamer will get. A sheep escaping in a dream. Seeing him hunting a small sheep and then running away from it indicates

Interpretation of a dream about the name Ahlam in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about the name Ahlam in a dream can It indicates aspiration for the best, and God knows the unseen. In case the dreamer sees the name Ahlam, it may lead to abandoning patience, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the name of dreams can also express the pursuit of desires, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. In the event that a married man sees the dream name, it may mean that he gets rid of His problems with his wife, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name Afaf in a dream. title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive and hugging a living person and both of them are crying

preview.html: In this article, we will examine for you the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive and hugging a living person and they are both crying in detail. Seeing a dead person is one of the visions that arouse the dreamers’ curiosity because dreams are the only communication link through which the dreamer can see the deceased of his loved ones, as it is impossible to see them from the new in reality, and sometimes it expresses the dreamer’s desire to see his loved ones who died in a dream, but in Other times, these dreams send different messages to the dreamer related to him or the dead person. What are the messages behind the dead person’s crying and embracing the dreamer in the dream? We will reveal this to you through an encyclopedia. The interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive and hugging a living person, and both of them are crying. A dream about hugging the dead. Seeing a dead person crying and hugging the dreamer in a dream is a praiseworthy dream, and it is a reassuring message to the dreamer stating that he is in a better place with God, and God knows best. If he sees The dreamer is embracing the deceased for a long time, then this vision expresses the close relationship between the dreamer and the deceased and the extent of the dreamer’s love for him in reality. In the case of embracing the dead mother in the dream, this vision is one of the visions that express goodness and blessing in reality. Seeing a dead person hugging him and talking to him In a dream, it means that the dreamer will do something worthy of praise, which is the end of the worries and problems that the dreamer faces in reality. Seeing the deceased crying in a dream Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing the dead person crying in a dream as one of the hated dreams that indicates his punishment in the afterlife, and God knows best if he cries loudly. On the other hand, if the dreamer sees that he is crying without making any sound, then this vision expresses a good ending and his presence in a better place in the afterlife. As for seeing a father crying in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is facing a series of crises in reality. Dreaming of a father crying in The dream also symbolizes that the dreamer longs to see his deceased father in reality, and also expresses the dreamer’s evil and taboo actions in reality. If you see a mother crying in a dream, this indicates how much the dreamer loves her and his sadness over her separation. It also expresses her sadness over her son’s rule in reality. Interpretation of hugging and crying a dead person in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream hugging her deceased father, then this vision shows the extent of her father’s love for him and his desire for him to be at his best. As for seeing the arms of an unknown dead person crying in a dream, this is a sign of the dreamer’s resurrection. Forbidden actions in reality, and it is also a sign of being exposed to a major crisis, and God knows best. In the case of hugging a dead mother, this vision is one of the good visions that express goodness and happiness and symbolizes the approaching date of her wedding, and God knows best. Seeing the arms of the dead symbolizes the dreamer’s long life, and God knows best. If you see a dead father crying in a dream, this is a sign of his anger at his daughter’s actions in reality. When you see a deceased relative crying in a dream, this vision shows how much he needs prayers and charity for him. Hugging and crying a dead person in a dream for a married womanWhen she sees a married woman

title: The interpretation of seeing a husband in a dream includes the correct interpretations

preview.html: Learn about seeing a husband in a dream in detail. According to Ibn Sirin, dreams are classified as a group of visual scenes that come to a person’s mind during his sleep, and among many people believe that they are merely things and influences that a person is exposed to during his day. It comes to represent him in his dreams or they may be things that are difficult for him to achieve in reality, so he resorted to achieving them in his dreams. However, it has been found that dreams carry many symbols and signs that reflect human life in reality, so many seek to interpret their dreams and find out what is in store. The future is theirs. Today we present to you the interpretation of seeing a husband in a dream by Ibn Sirin from the encyclopedia website, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a husband in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained that a wife seeing her husband in a dream indicates the strong bond of love, tenderness and compassion that unites the spouses. A wife seeing her husband in good condition indicates an abundance of sustenance. Blessing is in the money they enjoy in their lives. Whoever sees in her dream that her husband will marry her again, her vision stems from feelings of nostalgia for the early days of their marriage and her desire to revive good memories between them. The vision also reflects feelings of kindness and friendliness between the spouses. When a wife sees herself living with her husband in a dream, her vision is a sign of family cohesion and the strength of the relationship that brings them together. Whoever sees her husband laughing in a dream, then sees her skin being good, will soon hear good news. Interpretation of a husband in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a single woman swaying with a man A stranger whom she does not know suggests that he is her husband and treats her as if she were his wife, as if he is living in this period of emotional deprivation in reality. When an unmarried woman sees in a dream her husband with a handsome appearance and an elegant appearance, she respects him deeply, believing that Almighty God will grant her good fortune in this world. And he gives her a good husband who makes her heart happy. While an unmarried woman sees her husband in a dirty and inappropriate form, it is an unwanted vision that warns her of sad things happening in the coming period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a sick husband in a dream: A wife who sees her husband in a dream in a sick form or that he Dying indicates the deterioration of their living conditions in reality, which makes the wife think a lot about the requirements of life and suffer from a lack of livelihood and money. Also, this vision may indicate the presence of differences between the spouses in reality. And whoever sees her husband dying in a dream, perhaps her vision indicates that she She will travel for work for a temporary period, then he will return to her again. Whoever sees herself in a dream searching for her husband, this vision is an indication of her feeling of emotional emptiness due to her husband’s preoccupation with his work, family, and home. Whoever sees her husband in a dream and he actually died, he will ask her to bring him food or drink. Seeing her is a sign of his need to pray and give charity to his soul. Interpretation of seeing a husband with another woman in a dream When a wife sees her husband with another woman, this indicates feelings of jealousy and her intense love for the husband and does not indicate at all the husband’s betrayal of his wife as many believe. It shows the wife’s second marriage

Interpretation of seeing a sick husband in a dream: A wife who sees her husband in a dream in a sick form or that he Dying indicates the deterioration of their living conditions in reality, which makes the wife think a lot about the requirements of life and suffer from a lack of livelihood and money. Also, this vision may indicate the presence of differences between the spouses in reality. And whoever sees her husband dying in a dream, perhaps her vision indicates that she She will travel for work for a temporary period, then he will return to her again. Whoever sees herself in a dream searching for her husband, this vision is an indication of her feeling of emotional emptiness due to her husband’s preoccupation with his work, family, and home. Whoever sees her husband in a dream and he actually died, he will ask her to bring him food or drink. Seeing her is a sign of his need to pray and give charity to his soul. Interpretation of seeing a husband with another woman in a dream When a wife sees her husband with another woman, this indicates feelings of jealousy and her intense love for the husband and does not indicate at all the husband’s betrayal of his wife as many believe. It shows the wife’s second marriage

title: What is the interpretation of seeing oranges for unmarried women?

preview.html: The color orange in a dream is a symbol of health, satisfaction of desires, and marriage, and the dreamed orange carries some good interpretations in the dream of married and married women and in the dream in general... Here is an article about the interpretation of the vision of orange for the poor and married woman. What is the interpretation of seeing oranges for the single woman? If a woman dreams With a pot of a large orange on a tree and she could not reach it, it means that she does not trust men and may remain alone for a long time. To dream of an orange in the hand of a loved one or a loved one is a sign of a happy meeting. If a public girl planning her wedding sees an orange in In a dream, this means that her married life will be happy. If an ordinary girl tries to pick fruit from the top of the tree in her dream, this indicates that it is difficult for her to choose a partner and that she is not in a hurry to get married. If a woman dreams that she is peeling an orange and does not eat it, this means That she will reveal her feelings to someone with whom she carries many feelings and emotions. If a woman sees in her dream that someone gives her an orange, this indicates affection and love. What is the interpretation of seeing oranges for a single woman? Seeing oranges in a public woman’s dream is evidence that she is searching for the path to happiness. For an ordinary woman who sees herself eating oranges in a dream, this means the end of her fears and fatigue and the psychological comfort that she will feel. Seeing oranges in a dream for a married woman at an inappropriate time indicates that there are many quarrels taking place between her and her husband secretly. If a married woman sees She buys oranges from the market in her dream, then she is likely to separate from her partner, and the more oranges she buys, the longer the period of separation. If the husband sees in his dream that his wife gives him an orange, this symbolizes the relationship of love and affection that prevails between them in reality. Interpretation of the vision Oranges in a dreamIf you dream of having an orange in his hands, this means that you will meet a person who will play an important role in your life. The dream of buying oranges from the market symbolizes the fulfillment of an important desire in the dreamer’s life. If you see many orange trees with bright orange fruits, this means that your relationship It will lead to a strong and happy marriage. Dreaming about how to eat an orange symbolizes that the dreamer is dissatisfied with his personal life. If you peel an orange in your dream, it means that you will have a romantic date. Seeing an already peeled orange means feeling anxious because of a relative’s illness. If you see a tree A fruitful orange, then you do not have to worry about anything, this dream portends good health. In a dream you eat an orange and feel its sour taste, this means that you may encounter problems. If the smell of oranges is delicious and sweet, then problems will pass to you again. The dream in which you buy oranges portends From the market with family problems, health deterioration, and professional turmoil. If you see the peel of an orange, tangerine, or watermelon in your dream, it means that you will receive a great reward or a pleasant surprise, but if you eat the peel, it is a sign of unexpected happiness. Meaning of seeing oranges

title: Meanings of seeing envy in a dream in detail

preview.html: The meaning of envy in a dream: Seeing the letter “P” or seeing the eye of an envious person or animal, as well as dreaming of drawing an eye is considered clear envy. And the eye afflicts its owner with death, so when you dream of a grave or dream of death, as well as seeing a dead person is evidence of envy. Seeing people and animals looking at you with hatred And hate.good; Joseph's brothers threw him into the well because of their hatred for him and their envy of him because he had a high position with his father. Seeing circular objects, such as a circle or circular, because they resemble an eye. If you dream that you are tired, injured, sick, or helpless, this is envy. Seeing envy in a dream is different Envy dreams about the dreams of ordinary people sometimes, and it is a dream frequented by fear and terror, and in this case he must refer to the Book of God and read the two incantations, and they preserve the memories of the morning and evening in their hours. Among the strong connotations of envy in the dream are the following. The dream of a spy, because we are in In the modern era, we call a spy an “eye.” If he sees a spring with water, he envies you, and if it is unclean, then evil has befallen him. Seeing thieves in a dream, because a person loses the things that the thief takes from him, as well as the eye, and he also obtains blessings from the person. Seeing a camera or seeing The photographer calls it “the lens” and it symbolizes the eye. Seeing electricity, or dreaming of radiation, because its effect is strong and invisible, like the evil eye in a dream. Signs of envy in a dream: Seeing Jews is one of the strongest signs of envy and one of the strange dreams that you also frequent and you may not find an explanation for is the dream within A dream, for example sleeping in a dream and entering another dream, and envy because those scenes that you see with your eyes in the dream, and any connotation or thing that symbolizes the eye in the dream is envy, so the eye of your door envy you, as well as watching glasses and a telescope. Seeing envy in dreams Ibn Sirin said that the interpretation of seeing an envious person in a dream is bad and a warning, because the envious in a dream faces worry, anguish, and sadness in reality, and the envious in this vision will be blessed with kindness and livelihood, even if you are. You are jealous of someone in your dream, you will create new good relationships and friendships, but if you see a company that is jealous of you, you will go through a period of great anxiety, but your friends will comfort you. We are glad that you left your dream in a message at the end of this article and Shamloul will be happy to respond to you soon and do not forget to leave Your marital status.

title: Interpretation of a dream about blood returning to the ground in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of blood flowing on the ground in a dream First of all, the science of dream interpretation in Islam can be defined as one of the most important Islamic sciences contained in the Holy Qur’an and the Noble Prophet’s Sunnah. The Holy Qur’an and the Noble Prophetic Hadiths, and it is called by several names, such as the science of interpreting visions or expressing visions, and it is known that it is not recognized academically and is not taught in it. Accredited schools, universities, institutes and colleges. The most important dream interpretation books for Muslims. Before talking about the interpretation of a dream of blood flowing on the ground in a dream, we had to get to know the most prominent books and Muslim scholars interested in interpreting dreams and expressing visions, as there are many general elements. The origins of the science of dream interpretation in Islam, the most important of which are interpretation through the Holy Qur’an and the Prophet’s hadiths, interpretation with the similarity of names, forms, conditions and verbs, interpretation of opposites, contradiction of meaning and vice versa. The meaning and through proverbs, metaphor, and common metaphorical expressions are similar, with the exception of interpretation in the personal sense and increase and decrease. Islamic interpretation has written the following: The book of Ibn Sirin on the interpretation of dreams and the interpretation of dreams. The book Selections on the Interpretation of Dreams by Ibn Sirin. The book of animal perfumes as an expression of a dream, by the author of Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi. The book of signs in the science of sentences by Ghars al-Din Khalil al-Dhaheri. The dictionary of Ibrahim al-Maqdisi, the teacher’s book, and the letters of the owners. The interpretation of vomiting blood in a dream for a single woman. It is said about an unmarried girl who has never been married before and is still under the care of her guardian, whether he is a father, grandfather, or brother, and many Some of them are interested in searching for an explanation for vomiting blood. A dream for an unmarried woman about confidence, comfort, and psychological stability, as interpreted by Ibn Sirin. If an unmarried girl sees that she is making great progress in her dream, this indicates that she will gain and obtain a lot of money, go to good deeds, and live. In security, stability, and security, and staying away from people who want to harm her, but she will survive.Interpretation of a dream of vomiting red blood for a married woman. Interpretation of dreams is one of the most important sciences that Muslims are interested in. It is an Islamic legal science mentioned in the Holy Qur’an in many surahs and verses such as Surat Yusuf, and for its part. His interests. Many married women search for an interpretation of a dream about vomiting red blood for a married woman, as if a married woman saw in a dream that she was vomiting blood, and this means that she will soon get rid of all the people and things that are harmful to her. Harm to social, family, and marital life. There are some interpretations that she will carry a fetus in her womb as soon as possible and that she will become pregnant. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person vomiting blood. Many people are interested in learning the science of dream interpretation and its Islamic rules and regulations. On the other hand, many people search for an interpretation of a dream about a dead person. The one who vomited blood, as Ibn Sirin said that he saw in a dream that the dead person vomited blood, this indicates the necessity of abandoning the sins, transgressions, and errors committed by the dreamer. And sincere repentance to God Almighty

title: Interpretation of drinking milk in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: But this symbol is not suitable for all dreams because the details differ from one dream to another, and in our article today from gptafser.com/ we will explain the consequences of seeing milk in a dream for men and women. Interpretation of seeing drinking milk in a dream for a single girlWhen an unmarried girl dreams that she is drinking milk in a dream, this It symbolizes happiness and goodness in her life. For an unmarried girl, drinking milk in a dream indicates happy news that she will hear soon. Or an unmarried girl sees herself drinking copious amounts of milk until she feels like she is dying in the dream. The dream indicates that she will marry Saleh and leave her family’s home soon. And God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing clothes in a dream indicates that her marriage date is approaching. Whether you see a wolf drinking milk in an unmarried girl’s dream, this is a sign that she is making mistakes and gossiping about others. Seeing an unmarried girl eating a large amount of milk in a dream. A sign that the dreamer does good deeds and has a high degree of beauty. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is drinking white milk free of impurities. Good news for a successful romantic relationship. Drinking milk in a dream for an unmarried girl, because it symbolizes that all her desires will be fulfilled. And she achieves her goals in life correctly and quickly, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream of distributing milk to a single woman, a married woman, and a man. Interpretation of watching a married woman drink milk in a dream. Drinking milk in a married woman’s dream in large quantities is a good sign of the dreamer’s health, activity and vitality. As for the dream of a married woman By drinking milk and enjoying its taste, it is a metaphor for her concern for her health, herself, appearance, and home. If a married woman sees in a dream milk leaking from her breasts, this is an indication that she will fall into great trouble and all her deeds will be disturbed, and God knows best. As for a married woman seeing in a dream that the milk has dried up in her breasts This dream indicates her negligence in the rights of her home and husband, and she must re-examine herself, and God knows best. But when a married woman dreams that she sees herself in a dream drinking wolf’s milk, this is a sign of the presence of a cheerful woman in her husband’s life, and God knows best. In case the woman sees A married woman herself in a dream drinks cloudy milk, as this indicates the existence of disagreements with her husband, and God knows best. As for a married woman who dreams of drinking pure milk in a dream, it is good luck that these disagreements will end. For a married woman, seeing milk in abundance in a dream is a symbol of earning livelihood and blessing. In her life. As for a married woman who sees her husband drinking milk in a dream, the dream indicates a good position and promotion at work. Interpretation of the vision of drinking milk in a dream about the man and its meaning. A man who sees himself drinking milk in a dream is a sign of benefit, honor, and kindness to him. Seeing A man drinking milk in a dream means that he enjoys good luck, good luck, and getting close to God Almighty. As for a man who appears in a dream as if he is drinking tiger’s milk, it is a bad vision, as it indicates that he is earning his money.

title: Interpretation of the death of a father in a dream: Seeing a dead father in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the deceased father for the mourning daughter, for the married woman, for the pregnant woman, whether she is angry, sick, smiling, crying, addressing Ibn Sirin’s father. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s dead father. The father is a symbol of bond, strength, patience, and endurance for children. Seeing a father differs from seeing a mother in a dream, as the mother is a symbol of tenderness and affection. Seeing a father is like Warnings and warnings to the monarch. Seeing the father fortune teller in a dream laughing, smiling and rejoicing is good news for the fortune teller for the arrival of happy news, joys, or comfort and help from others in case the fortune teller needs it. Seeing the father in a dream symbolizes divine care and providence for the monarch. Seeing the father fortune teller as if he planted seeds and plants in a dream. It means that the fortuneteller will soon get married or the fortuneteller will soon have a child. As for the dreamer seeing that there is competition and enmity between him and his father, this indicates that the dreamer will discover and know the secrets that are very important to him in his life and future. And whoever sees that his father is accusing him in a dream, this indicates that the father is helping his son. And that the father raises him in the same way as his son. The dreamer’s vision of someone who resembles his father in a dream may indicate that the dreamer receives help from this person or feels affection towards him. It predicts the dreamer’s illness, and the sick person who sees his father in a dream heralds recovery, and the needy man who sees his father in a dream will bring him relief. God willing. Whoever sees his father giving him a gift in a dream, for example, as if he gave him a house to live in, this means that the dreamer is continuing what the father was doing in terms of deeds or deeds related to religion and that. Universality. As for the signs that warn of evil in the dreamer’s life, seeing the father digging in the ground in a dream is a warning to the dreamer that his guardianship and death will come, or the dreamer will harm him and make them very sad. He will not accept. Seeing one’s father sitting next to a wall or in a damaged or cracked house foretells the dreamer of dangers, misfortunes, and worries. Seeing one’s father cutting down his tree in a dream symbolizes disagreements and quarrels, and seeing one’s father’s illness in a dream portends the dreamer’s serious illness, and seeing the journey of a deceased father in a dream One indicates the dreamer's illness, and seeing the journey of the father who is still alive foretells the illness of the father himself. Seeing the death of the father alive warns the dreamer of his weakness and feelings of humiliation, God forbid. And seeing the dreamer as if he is scolding his father in the dream, warns the dreamer of his feelings of remorse. Severe about something committed and done. Also, many of the above-mentioned indicators apply to seeing a living father in a dream, and it should be noted that the previous symbols and connotations have to do with seeing the father being similar to his appearance in reality and not pale or pale. Weak or wearing torn clothes, etc. It is good to see a dead father in a dream. Seeing a fortuneteller seeing his father in a dream laughing, smiling and rejoicing is good news for the dreamer of the arrival of happy news, joys, comfort and help from others in case the fortuneteller needs it. Seeing a father in a dream symbolizes care. And divine providence for the pioneer. Seeing a father planting in a dream. Seeing the dreamer’s father planting seeds and plants in a dream.
